titles.title: All That God Is, Is Holy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All that God is, is holy.
All that God is, is divine.
All that God is, is eternal.
All that God is, is mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All that God is, is wisdom.
All that God is, is light.
All that God is, is righteous.
All that God is, is life.
Chorus:
And God is my inheritance.
In Christ I am His son.
In Him I have my being.
In Christ we have been made one.
